website_summaries.verdict: The SmartBand Talk's screen, waterproof design and ability to show your incoming notifications make it a useful piece of tech to wear, even if you're not fussed about keeping track of your activity during the day.
pros: The Sony SmartBand Talk's e-ink display makes it easy to see your activity, the time and incoming notifications
The display uses very little power so battery life is pretty good and its ability to take calls comes in handy when you're too busy (or too lazy) to fumble for your phone
cons: It doesn't have GPS, a heart-rate monitor or the most glamorous design
Sony's Lifelog fitness app keeps track of too much pointless information

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, automatically connects to my Sony Xperia after only pairing once! Generic trackers bands I've owned in the past always needed re-pairing every time the battery died. Speaking of battery life, this E-ink display is B&W but allows battery life to go for 2-3 days! Plus you can answer texts on it, and answer calls with speaker/mic feature!
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Screen froze on day 1!
customer_reviews.text: This watch was defective. The screen froze once the screen locked, thus displaying the time when it locked and not continually updating the time. Very unhappy with this and very unhappy with seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, Poor E-Ink Screen, Poor Interactions
customer_reviews.text: This thing has an overall nice design. It fits well and it's simple, both in looks and functionality. Unfortunately, the e-ink screen is very artifact-y with left over bits of text or images getting left over after screen refresh or text and images not showing very clearly to begin with. It brings the quality of the device down quite a lot for me. The multiple apps it's paired with are overly complex and poorly designed (visually). I regret buying this and really can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: The watch battery could not hold a charge even for an hour. Probably defective, but as a seller should know what you're selling.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Garza

customer_reviews.title: nice smartwatch would be better if it had a backlight ...
customer_reviews.text: nice smartwatch would be better if it had a backlight to see in the dark. other than that i love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: romand lewis

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smartband and when I got to peal the sticker off the screens I realized the liquid on the screen was damaged, although the packaging was OK. The bad thing is that this item was sent to me by to another country by a courier, so even if I wanted to return this it it'd cheaper to buy a new smartband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: The "Talk" function is no longer supported, and the LCD does not completely refresh; it leaves traces of previous notifications on the screen. It does not track your pulse, and I couldn't figure out how to answer calls using it. Save your money and get an actual SmartWatch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Skimin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, smart, sleek - love it!
customer_reviews.text: This not only tracks steps (walking or running), it is a phone! I just got it yesterday and am enjoying making and taking calls "from my wrist." Boss is so intrigued he's going to get one. My Fitbit died after one year (wouldn't take a charge), so I bought a cheap replacement. It worked but was horribly ugly. Neither of them acted as a phone. This Sony is beautiful! And I picked a watch face that was easiest for me to see without my readers. Would buy another in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Susan Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Good wearable that is engineered to stay within the limits ...
customer_reviews.text: Good wearable that is engineered to stay within the limits of current battery and display technology. Battery lasts a long time because of the e-ink display. Profile is slim and the the item is very light on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McKinney

customer_reviews.title: The best smart band because it can talk
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. I lost the 1st, and the 2dn worn out because I swim everyday. Love the this one better than the watch because I can pick up the phone call from it.
customer_reviews.author: Ha Le

customer_reviews.title: great buy, still working
customer_reviews.text: great buy, still working. it doesnt transmit data to phone's lifelog in real time.. seems to use a batching system to save on battery.. ill go for a run, when i get home and start to relax the phone and watch will go off saying i met goal.
customer_reviews.author: quantumforce

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it. Most useful is an option to talk without reaching for the phone. Battery is sufficient for almost 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: A piano guy

customer_reviews.title: Its a great band, I love everything it does
customer_reviews.text: Its a great band, I love everything it does. But everytime I walk two steps away from my phone it disconnects from it.
customer_reviews.author: RONNY S RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: I have bought and the glass is broken and service of sony is poor and and they dont change and offer much more ...
customer_reviews.text: Hello From turkey . Dont buy this product. I have bought and the glass is broken and service of sony is poor and and they dont change and offer much more more money to get a new one. I have used this watch only for 10 days. Especially in Turkey the selling part dont pay any attention to service they told that they no agreement with the service and the dealer. You are alone and sony dealers dont pay any attention to customers they say we only sell product you will follow all gurantee issues even if you buy this product in the first 10 days only. Finally it is not durable and it is broken
customer_reviews.author: ahmet turp

product_meta.title: Sony Smartwatch - White
product_meta.description: The smart band talk SWR30 is both a unique standalone device as well as a companion product that allows new interaction possibilities with your Android phone or tablet (Android version 4.4 or later). when worn on your wrist, monitor your physical activities such as steps, walk, run or jump as well as sleep cycle. Use it to set personal goals and track your progress. The smart E Ink display displays time, notifications and the status of monitored activities. Add new features with a host of applications available for your smart band talk on Google play and Get the most out of your accessory. With an IP rating of IP68, the dust tight and highly water resistant design is well equipped to take whatever life throws at it.
feature_bullets: Smart band Talk is designed for comfort and style. The ergonomic design means you can wear it all day. Interchangeable bands lets you Change to match your style
E ink display has a low power consumption so the battery lasts longer. The display shows incoming messages, text, email as well as the status of your activities like steps and sleep cycle
Download additional applications on Google play to add new Features and get the most out of your Smart band Talk
Dust tight and water resistant design means your accessory is equipped to take whatever life throws at it. It is the perfect companion to your active lifestyle

Enjoy true hands free calling without reaching for your Phone. The hands free calling Feature of Smart band Talk means you will never Miss a call. The Smart band Talk use voice commands so you never have to reach for your Phone

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars34 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Sony Smartband Talk SWR30 - US Warranty
